title: The maides tragedy As it hath beene diuers times acted at the Blacke-friers by the Kings Maiesties Seruants.
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Richard Higgenbotham and are to be sold at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: By Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher.
A variant of the edition with Francis Constable in the imprint.
Running title reads: The maydes tragedy.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
